content.question: Which of the following species is the strongest base in the reaction represented above?

choices.label: <math alttext="C H 3 N H 3 with a positive 1 charge, aqueous" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>NH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>q</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></math>
